mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.username,u.email,u.avatar,r.role_name FROM `pandown_user`AS u INNER JOIN `pandown_user_role` AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN `pandown_role` AS r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = #{id};

SELECT u.id,u.username,u.email,uf.parse_num,uf.parse_flow,uf.limit_flow,uf.state,r.role_name FROM `pandown_user` AS u INNER JOIN `pandown_user_flow` AS uf ON u.id = uf.id INNER JOIN `pandown_user_role` AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN `pandown_role` AS r ON ur.role_id = r.id
